mdRecord.dcterms:title: An Open Letter from Citizens for Public Education to the White Parents of Prince Edward County
mdRecord.dcterms:description: An Open Letter from Citizens for Public Education to the White Parents of Prince Edward County / In the letter, it is explained that registration forms for the Prince Edward Foundation schools (Academy) are legally binding contracts. The letter also contains a "workable way to move forward." / Individuals referenced: J. B. Wall
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Unknown
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: United States--Race Relations
Civil Rights Movements--United States
School Integration--Massive Resistance Movement--Southern States
Prince Edward County Free School Association (Va.)
Prince Edward County (Va.)
